short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do quick style checks on your page after it renders, without leaving your browser, and with minimal friction to setup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Add settings. 
2. Run in-browser. 
3. See red buttons. 

In order to annotate your page, this extension reads and modifies your page's DOM. 

More info: https://github.com/hchiam/in-browser-style-linter
